comment: The main text block containing Chinese characters, arranged in vertical columns with annotations, definitions, and phonetic transcriptions (e.g., '昌石切', '諸氏切'). The text includes both small seal script (篆书) and regular script (楷书), typical of classical Chinese dictionaries like the *Shuowen Jiezi*. The right margin contains page numbers or section identifiers ('小豆9', '言文八下', '王生').
